name: Terminal Hacker (itch) (thejacobhardman)
description:
My first major unity project. I have to say that despite it being very basic, I am still very proud of it.

Special thanks to Ben Tristem and the GameDev.tv team for putting together an amazing Unity Dev course on Udemy!

I hope you enjoy it!

(Try typing "whoami" and "007" for a couple of fun Easter eggs!)
